allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add comprehensive PDF tools

- PDF to Image conversion \(JPG/PNG\)
- PDF to Text extraction
- PDF Merge \(combine multiple PDFs\)
- PDF Split \(divide by pages/ranges\)
- Page Extract \(select specific pages\)
- Page Delete \(remove unwanted pages\)
- Page Reorder \(drag & drop sorting\)
- Page Rotate \(90/180/270 degrees\)

All features are 100% browser-based using pdf-lib and pdfjs-dist.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add multilingual support \(Korean/English\)

- Add i18next for internationalization
- Create translation files \(ko.json, en.json\)
- Add language selector \(KR/EN\) in header
- Update all pages with translations
- Move PDF to first position in menu and home
- Fix PDF.js worker configuration for v5.x

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
